# Create an empty dataframe and add new rows to it

```{r}
df = data.frame(Model = character(),
                MSPE = double(),
                stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

summary(df)
```

```{r}
df = rbind(df, data.frame('Model' = "ABC", 'MSPE' = 12.34))
df = rbind(df, data.frame('Model' = "EFG", 'MSPE' = 56.78))
df = rbind(df, data.frame('Model' = "QSC", 'MSPE' = 43.19))
df
```

# Sort the dataframe by a given column

```{r}
df[order(df$MSPE),]
```
